group_1.narration: I ended up running away after all.
I don't feel like going to a different@store to get another knife now.
I questioned myself to why I ran away...@and at the same time,@I was very uncomfortable with myself@for having escaped.

group_1.textRight: ...tation, the last train will be departing shortly.

group_1.narration: I hear the announcer saying that the last train@is about to leave...
Upon hearing that,@people started hurrying towards the station.
Should I try to go@as far as my money will carry me?
Leave all of this behind,@and go live a completely different life,@in a completely different place...
It’s not going to be easy.
But if the only alternative is to stay here@and keep on losing myself,@just enduring everything without ever@finding relief or joy...
Are you going to abandon Mom?
Do you really want to throw away@every last thing here?

group_1.textLeft: Take it easy, Mom!@I'm gonna make dinner today!

group_1.textRight: But...weren't you going to go play with your@friends?

group_1.textLeft: It's fine!@I’ll explain it to them, they won’t mind.

Mom, you're always so busy. I want to show@you my...what was it called?[chara:801600:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:801600:lipSynch_1][chara:801600:cheek_0][chara:801600:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.json] App, appreesh...
Right, I want to show you my appreciation!
Don't worry about anything! You've got me!

group_1.narration: That's right, I don't want to leave everything behind.@There were also things I want to protect right here...
Why do I keep remembering these things?
Why am I trying to dull my resolve?
Immersing myself in memories@won't change anything.
All they do...is keep me tied down.

group_1.textCenter: I wish both him and these memories would@just disappear.
I wish everything would just disappear...
Then I could finally be free...

group_1.textRight: What if I said I could make that wish@come true?
Nice to meet you, Mikoto Sena.@My name is Kyubey.

group_1.narration: When that thing that looked like an@animal spoke to me, I was so confused@I couldn't even speak.
But I also had the definite feeling@that something was about to begin.
